itunes:summary: Failure is normal, but it's easier to respond & resolve when your team has trust. Paul Marsicovetere joins the show to share his experiences and important lessons he's learned from failures & mentors.
itunes:subtitle: Failure is normal, but it's easier to respond & resolve when your team has trust. Paul Marsicovetere joins the show to share his experiences and important lessons he's learned from failures & mentors.
itunes:keywords: reliability, resilience, chaos, engineering, SRE, technology, programming, infrastructure
